<[[#]]> <[[#]]>
CELEBRATING DADS THIS JUNE Dear {{Lead.First Name}},
Thank you for your interest in Martell's Cohiba Cognac Father's Day Special.
Our Relationship Manager James Ting will be in touch with you shortly to confirm your order and delivery details.
Yours sincerely,
Martell Singapore
<[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/?fref=ts]]>
<[[https://www.instagram.com/martellcognac]]>
